name: Shoot for the Moon
description:
Shoot for the Moon

Resist the planet's gravitational pull by clicking on passing moons to harpoon them, keeping you in orbit. See how long you can survive.

You can read about the evolution of the idea for this game, from sketch to concept here: https://www.rustyrocket.co.uk/2019/12/game-jam-entry-shoot-for-moon.html
